ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] An apocryphal example of why GET should be safe ...
ygData.msgSnippet: Reminds me of the story Roy tells about - IIRC - how a guy complained to him that MOMspider had initiated a bunch of print jobs on his printers. 8-)

Reminds me of the story Roy tells about - IIRC - how a guy complained
to him that MOMspider had initiated a bunch of print jobs on his
printers. 8-)
